author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO WEAKENING AND ITS TIME IS FLEETING AS A TROPICAL CYCLONE...
summary: ...MARIO WEAKENING AND ITS TIME IS FLEETING AS A TROPICAL CYCLONE... As of 2:00 AM PDT Tue Sep 16 the center of Mario was located near 21.9, -115.7 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO WEAKENING AND ITS TIME IS FLEETING AS A TROPICAL CYCLONE... As of 2:00 AM PDT Tue Sep 16 the center of Mario was located near 21.9, -115.7 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
